
{{alias}}( [p] )
    Returns a directory for user-specific configuration files.

    Notes:

    - On Windows platforms, the function first checks for a `LOCALAPPDATA`
      environment variable before checking for an `APPDATA` environment
      variable. This means that machine specific user configuration files have
      precedence over roaming user configuration files.

    Parameters
    ----------
    p: string (optional)
        Path to append to a base directory.

    Returns
    -------
    out: string|null
         Directory.

    Examples
    --------
    > var dir = {{alias}}()
    e.g., '/Users/<username>/Library/Preferences'
    > dir = {{alias}}( 'appname/config' )
    e.g., '/Users/<username>/Library/Preferences/appname/config'
